name: Ciena Ree
subtitle: Adept Pilot
text: Power Action - Spend 2 resources to ready a vehicle.
flavor: A veteran of the battles over Endor and Jakku, Captain Ree was an accomplished pilot and commander.
label: Ciena Ree - Adept Pilot

name: General Hux
subtitle: Aspiring Commander
text: [special] - Play a Red event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 for each character you have.
flavor: "All remaining systems will bow to the First Order!"
label: General Hux - Aspiring Commander

name: MagnaGuard
text: Before this character would be defeated by damage, instead defeat it after this round ends.
flavor: The IG-100 MagnaGuard droid could withstand massive damage before total system failure.
label: MagnaGuard

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Master Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a number. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it that costs the chosen number.
flavor: "I study the art of war."
label: Thrawn - Master Strategist

name: AT-DP
text: [special] - Discard a support that costs 2 or less from play.
flavor: The All Terrain Defense Pod was a heavily armed walker used to protect Imperial assets on occupied worlds.
label: AT-DP

name: Probe Droid
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand and discard any of those cards that are events.
flavor: "We have thousands of probe droids searching the galaxy." <cite>Admiral Ozzel</cite>
label: Probe Droid

name: T-7 Ion Disruptor Rifle
text: To play, spot a Red character. Action - Discard a card from your hand to turn this die to the side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on this die.
label: T-7 Ion Disruptor Rifle

name: Quinlan Vos
subtitle: Dark Disciple
text: [special] - Deal damage to an opponent's character equal to the number of cards in your hand more than the number of cards in that opponent's hand.
flavor: "Are you finished messing around?"
label: Quinlan Vos - Dark Disciple

name: Servant of the Dark Side
text: Before one of your other Blue characters is defeated, you may move an upgrade from it to this character (return that upgrade's die to its card).
label: Servant of the Dark Side

name: Seventh Sister
subtitle: Agile Inquisitor
text: After you activate this character, you may roll an ID9 Seeker Droid ([EaW]13) die into your pool (its X value is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool). Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Seventh Sister - Agile Inquisitor

name: Grand Inquisitor
subtitle: Sith Loyalist
text: [special] - Remove a character die showing a blank ([blank]). Then deal 2 damage to that character.
flavor: "At last, a fight that might be worthy of my time."
label: Grand Inquisitor - Sith Loyalist

name: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to deal damage to a character equal to the damage on it.
flavor: The TIE/x1 was an advanced prototype flown by Darth Vader at the Battle of Yavin
label: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced

name: ID9 Seeker Droid
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool (when resolving dice, resolve them one at a time).
label: ID9 Seeker Droid

name: Temptation
text: [special] - Choose an opponent. That opponent may draw 2 cards. If they do, you gain 2 resources. If they do not, you draw 2 cards.
flavor: "You want this, don't you?" <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Temptation

name: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a character die to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber

name: Bazine Netal
subtitle: Master Manipulator
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has no damage on it.
flavor: "Inform the First Order… I've found the droid."
label: Bazine Netal - Master Manipulator

name: Bossk
subtitle: Wookiee Slayer
text: After you activate this character, you may move 1 damage from an opponent's character to another character (this ignores shields).
label: Bossk - Wookiee Slayer

name: Cad Bane
subtitle: Vicious Mercenary
text: Action - Play an upgrade from your hand on this character (paying its cost). Then you may activate him.
flavor: "I'll take on any job… for the right price."
label: Cad Bane - Vicious Mercenary

name: Gamorrean Guard
text: Guardian.
label: Gamorrean Guard

name: Hound's Tooth
text: After you activate this support, you may remove one of your Yellow character dice to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Bossk's ship was a YV-666 light freighter modified to serve the bounty hunter's needs.
label: Hound's Tooth

name: Cable Launcher
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose a character. Remove one of its character dice or spend 1 resource to remove 2 of its character dice.
label: Cable Launcher

name: LL-30 Blaster Pistol
text:
Ambush.
Redeploy.
[special] - Turn another one of your dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: LL-30 Blaster Pistol

name: Relby-V10 Mortar Gun
text: Action - Spend 2 resources and remove this die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to deal that damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Relby-V10 Mortar Gun

name: General Rieekan
subtitle: Defensive Mastermind
text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from the top of an opponent's deck for each of your other characters with 1 or more shields.
label: General Rieekan - Defensive Mastermind

name: Hera Syndulla
subtitle: Phoenix Leader
text: [special] - Play a vehicle from your hand for free. After the action phase ends, if that vehicle is still in play, return it to your hand.
flavor: "If all you do is fight for your own life, then your life is worth nothing!"
label: Hera Syndulla - Phoenix Leader

name: K-2SO
subtitle: Reprogrammed Droid
text: The cost to play a weapon on this character is increased by 2. After you play or move a weapon onto this character for the first time each game, ready him.
flavor: "Why does she get a blaster and I don't?"
label: K-2SO - Reprogrammed Droid

name: Rookie Pilot
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your vehicle dice.
flavor: The first time in the cockpit was always thrilling… even if it was the last.
label: Rookie Pilot

name: Ghost
text: [special] - Resolve another side of this die.
flavor: The Ghost was a specialized VCX-100 light freighter that served as the base of operations for Hera Syndulla's rebel cell.
label: Ghost

name: Y-Wing
text: [special] - Force an opponent to deal damage to their characters, distributed as they wish, or lose resource, until they have dealt and lost a combined total of 4.
label: Y-Wing

name: A280 Blaster Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Give 2 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: A280 Blaster Rifle

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Force Operative
text: After you activate this character for the first time each round, you may spend resources equal to the number of dice you just rolled to ready her.
flavor: "I am no Jedi."
label: Ahsoka Tano - Force Operative

name: Jedi Instructor
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your character dice to a side showing the same symbol as this die.
flavor: That Jedi passed down their wisdom and craft from Master to Padawan.
label: Jedi Instructor

name: Kanan Jarrus
subtitle: Rebel Jedi
text: Before you take an action, you may resolve one of this die.
flavor: "There's a lot more at stake than you realize."
label: Kanan Jarrus - Rebel Jedi

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Jedi Champion
text: Action - Remove this die to defeat a character with 2 or less remaining health.
flavor: "This party's over."
label: Mace Windu - Jedi Champion

name: Training Remote
text: You may resolve the modifier sides on this die to modify any symbol on one of your Blue character dice.
flavor: "Look, good against remotes is one thing. Good against the living? That's something else." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Training Remote

name: Master of the Council
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready a character.
flavor: "The council has assembled." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Master of the Council

name: Coordination
text: [special] - Give each of your characters 1 shield.
label: Coordination

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Force-sensitive Thief
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
[special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent.
flavor: "Hey, a kid's gotta eat."
label: Ezra Bridger - Force-sensitive Thief

name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Galactic Entrepreneur
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
flavor: "Yeah. I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being successful."
label: Lando Calrissian - Galactic Entrepreneur

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Explosives Expert
text: Before you activate this character, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on her, decreasing its cost by 1 if it has the word "Thermal" in its title.
flavor: "I'll damage you if you don't shut up."
label: Sabine Wren - Explosives Expert

name: Wookiee Warrior
flavor: "It's not wise to upset a wookiee." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Wookiee Warrior

name: Chopper
text: [special] - Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
flavor: C1-10P was a temperamental astromech better known to the members of its rebel cell as "Chopper".
label: Chopper

name: Energy Slingshot
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to reroll it instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Energy Slingshot

name: Tough Haggler
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and choose 2 cards in it. Then discard those cards unless that opponent spends 2 resources.
label: Tough Haggler

name: T-47 Airspeeder
text: [special] - Exhaust a support or draw 2 cards.
flavor: The Incom Corporation T-47 airspeeder was a rugged low-altitude vehicle prized by the Alliance for its durability.
label: T-47 Airspeeder

name: LR1K Sonic Cannon
text: Before resolving this die, you may exhaust one of your characters. If you do, you do not have to pay the resource cost on this die.
flavor: Developed by the Geonosians, the LR1K generated deadly sonic blasts.
label: LR1K Sonic Cannon

name: Electrostaff
text: The resource cost of attached character's character dice modified by this die is decreased by 1.
label: Electrostaff

name: Natural Pilot
text: After you activate attached character, you may ready a vehicle.
label: Natural Pilot

name: Ancient Lightsaber
text: Action - Heal 2 damage from attached character. Place this upgrade on the bottom of your deck.
label: Ancient Lightsaber

name: Psychometry
text: Blue character only. [special] - Draw cards equal to the value showing on an equipment or weapon die. You may remove that die.
label: Psychometry

name: Shoto Lightsaber
text: After you activate attached character, if it has another Blue weapon, you may give it 1 shield or remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Shoto Lightsaber

name: Weapons Cache
text: [special] - Play a weapon from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: Weapons Cache

name: BD-1 Cutter Vibro-AX
text: Before this die deals damage to a character, you may remove all shields from that character.
label: BD-1 Cutter Vibro-AX

name: Extortion
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose an opponent. If you have more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) than that opponent, take 1 resource from them.
label: Extortion

name: X-8 Night Sniper
text: Ambush. Action - Spend 1 resource to turn this die to any side.
flavor: The X-8 Night Sniper's computerized scope and built-in silencer made it a weapon of choice for Lando Calrissian.
label: X-8 Night Sniper

name: Z-95 Headhunter
flavor: Developed by Incom Corporation and Subpro, the Z-95 Headhunter was a versatile snub-fighter that continued to see use long after it was surpassed by the T-65 X-Wing.
label: Z-95 Headhunter

name: Chance Cube
text: Before you activate attached character, return this upgrade to your hand unless you spend 1 resource.
flavor: "We'll let fate decide." <cite>Watto</cite>
label: Chance Cube

name: EMP Grenades
text: [special] - Discard a droid or vehicle from play. Discard this upgrade from play.
flavor: Electromagnetic pulse grenades were extremely effective against weapon platforms with electronic systems.
label: EMP Grenades

name: Lead by Example
text: After you activate attached character, you may activate one of your supports.
label: Lead by Example

name: Scatterblaster
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to up to 4 different characters. Action - Remove one of attached character's character dice to turn this die to any side.
label: Scatterblaster

name: Commandeer
text: Resolve an opponent's vehicle die as if it were your own. If that die has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.
label: Commandeer

name: Crossfire
text: Remove a die showing a resource cost or spend 1 resource to remove 2 dice showing a resource cost.
flavor: "Watch that crossfire, boys." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Crossfire

name: Drop Your Weapon!
text: Spot 2 Red characters to discard a weapon from a ready character.
label: Drop Your Weapon!

name: Imperial Backing
text:
Ambush.
Play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 for each character you have.
label: Imperial Backing

name: Prepare for War
text: Play only if this is the first action of this round (no player has taken an action). Gain 1 resource.
label: Prepare for War

name: Red Alert
text: Ready a non-unique Red character.
label: Red Alert

name: Ruthless Tactics
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the resource cost showing on it.
label: Ruthless Tactics

name: Take Prisoner
text: Choose an opponent. Discard 2 random cards from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.
label: Take Prisoner

name: Imperial HQ
text: Before you resolve a die showing a resource cost, you may exhaust this support to decrease that resource cost by 1.
label: Imperial HQ

name: As You Command
text: Resolve one of your character dice as if it were showing a focus ([focus]) (it keeps its value).
label: As You Command

name: Cornered Prey
text: Count the number of dice an opponent has showing a blank ([blank]). Deal that much damage to a character.
label: Cornered Prey

name: Indomitable
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character.
Give a Blue character 3 shields.
flavor: "Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Indomitable

name: It Will All Be Mine
text: Turn each of an opponent's dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side. Then resolve any number of those dice in the order of your choice, as if they were your own.
label: It Will All Be Mine

name: Kill Them All
text: Deal 1 damage to each non-unique character your opponents have.
flavor: The First Order executed every member of the village on Jakku rather than leave any witnesses.
label: Kill Them All

name: Unyielding
text: Resolve any number of your Blue dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) in the order of your choice, treating this damage as unblockable.
label: Unyielding

name: Insidious
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource if an opponent's character die is showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Insidious

name: Hate
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may deal it 1 damage to deal 1 damage to another character.
label: Hate

name: Anarchy
text: Remove one of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to each of an opponent's characters equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Anarchy

name: Bounty Postings
text: Draw cards equal to the number of characters an opponent has.
label: Bounty Postings

name: Buy Out
text: Spend any number of resources. Then discards cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of resources you just spent.
label: Buy Out

name: Coercion
text: Spot a Yellow character to reveal an opponent's hand and choose an event in it. They must play that event as their next action, if able.
label: Coercion

name: Only Business Matters
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then gain 1 resource for each die you just removed.
label: Only Business Matters

name: Pilfered Goods
text: You may play an upgrade from your hand for free on each of your Yellow characters.
flavor: The best gear is hard to come by legality.
label: Pilfered Goods

name: Twin Shadows
text: Spot 2 characters with the same title to remove up to 2 dice.
label: Twin Shadows

name: Hutt Ties
text: Action - Exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or choose and remove one of their dice.
flavor: The Hutts were powerful gangsters with an interplanetary criminal empire.
label: Hutt Ties

name: Deadly
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove one of attached character's dice to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Deadly

name: No Survivors
text: Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters.
label: No Survivors

name: Detention Center
text: Action - Exhaust this support to remove a character die. Then any player may remove one of their character dice to discard this support from play.
label: Detention Center

name: All Quiet On The Front
text: Remove any number of shields from your characters. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of shields you just removed.
label: All Quiet On The Front

name: Entrenched
text: Give 5 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Entrenched

name: Fortuitous Strike
text: Spot a Red character to reroll any number of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just rerolled that are now showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Fortuitous Strike

name: Rearguard
text: Count the number of Red dice you have showing a shield ([shield]). Remove up to that many dice.
flavor: "It's risky, but we can't hold out much longer." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Rearguard

name: Reckless Reentry
text: Choose a die on one of your vehicles in play and roll it into your pool. Then discard that vehicle if its die just rolled a blank ([blank]).
label: Reckless Reentry

name: Strike Briefing
text: Look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order. Then you may discard the top card of that deck.
label: Strike Briefing

name: Swift Strike
text: Remove a die showing a modifier side (a side with a +).
label: Swift Strike

name: Rally Aid
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reveal a random card in your hand. You may play that card, decreasing its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if it's a vehicle.
label: Rally Aid

name: Shield Generator
text: Before one of your supports would be discarded from play by an opponent's card effect or die, you may instead discard this support from play.
label: Shield Generator

name: At Peace
text: Turn each die that has one or more blanks to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: At Peace

name: Bestow
text: Move a non-ability upgrade from one of your Blue characters to another character (return that upgrade's die to its card).
flavor: "This is your father's lightsaber." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Bestow

name: Bring Balance
text: Choose an opponent that has more cards in hand than you. Draw cards up to the number of cards in their hand.
label: Bring Balance

name: Reaping The Crystal
text: Play a Blue card that costs 3 or more from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Reaping The Crystal

name: Secret Mission
text: Choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow, or Gray). Then discard the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is the chosen color, gain 1 resource.
label: Secret Mission

name: Trust The Force
text: Reroll any number of Blue dice.
label: Trust The Force

name: Funeral Pyre
text: Before one of your Blue characters is defeated, you may move an upgrade from it to another one of your characters (return that upgrade's die to its card).
label: Funeral Pyre

name: Yoda's Quarters
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your character dice to heal 2 damage from that character.
label: Yoda's Quarters

name: Fearless
text: After you activate attached character, you may give it 1 shield and draw a card.
label: Fearless

name: Against The Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it just rerolled the same symbol, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2.
label: Against The Odds

name: Appraise
text: Remove one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: Appraise

name: Bad Feeling
text: Remove one of your dice to reroll any number of dice.
label: Bad Feeling

name: Double-Cross
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to resolve an opponent's die as if it were your own.
label: Double-Cross

name: Impersonate
text: Move damage among your characters as you wish (this ignores shields and you cannot exceed a character's health while moving this damage).
label: Impersonate

name: Local Patrol
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Local Patrol

name: Quick Escape
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). You must pass all of your future turns this round.
label: Quick Escape

name: Tenacity
text:
Play only if an opponent has more characters than you.
Exhaust one of that opponent's characters.
label: Tenacity

name: Running Interference
text: After you take an action, you may set this support aside to choose an opponent. That opponent cannot take the same action that you just took on their next turn.
label: Running Interference

name: Thermal Paint
text: After you activate attached character, force an opponent to choose and deal 1 damage to one of their characters. Then you may discard this upgrade to deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Thermal Paint

name: Defiance
text: Reroll one of your character dice. Then heal damage from that character equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Defiance

name: Covering Fire
text: Count the number of dice you have showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Reroll up to that many of an opponent's dice.
label: Covering Fire

name: Deploy Squadron
text: Activate any number of your supports in the order of your choice.
label: Deploy Squadron

name: Fall Back
text: Each player may choose 1 upgrade, starting with you. Discard all upgrades from play that were not just chosen.
label: Fall Back

name: Feint
text: Activate one of your characters. Then you may remove all of its character and upgrade dice to ready it.
label: Feint

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Count the number of support dice in your pool. Deal that much damage to a character.
label: Flanking Maneuver

name: Heat Of Battle
text: Choose an opponent. That opponent turns up to 2 of their dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Heat Of Battle

name: Pinned Down
text: Spot a vehicle to remove a die.
label: Pinned Down

name: The Day is Ours
text: Claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round.
label: The Day is Ours

name: Drop Zone
text: After you claim the battlefield, you may place 1 damage on this support. Action - Exhaust this support to move any amount of damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Drop Zone

name: Tech Team
text: Before you play a support, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Tech Team

name: Battle of Wills
text: Each player activates one of their characters, starting with you. Then each player totals the value of the character dice they just rolled, and each player with the lowest combined value removes theirs.
label: Battle of Wills

name: Force Vision
text: Ambush. Look at the top 5 cards of a player's deck (do not rearrange them).
label: Force Vision

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Lightsaber Pull

name: Lightsaber Training
text: Turn up to 2 of your Blue weapon dice to sides of your choice.
label: Lightsaber Training

name: No Surrender
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice showing a blank ([blank]). Then you may resolve it.
label: No Surrender

name: Something Familiar
text: Spot 2 Blue character to reveal a random card from an opponent's hand. Then you may turn a number of dice equal to or less than that card's cost to sides of your choice.
label: Something Familiar

name: Voices Cry Out
text: Reroll all dice showing a value of 2 or higher.
flavor: "I felt a great disturbance in the Force…" <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Voices Cry Out

name: Keen Instincts
text: Blue character only. Action - Remove one of attached character's character dice to give it 1 shield.
label: Keen Instincts

name: Battle Rage
text: Spot a character that has 6 or more damage on it. Resolve one of that character's character dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.
label: Battle Rage

name: Disable
text: Exhaust a support.
label: Disable

name: Persuade
text: Choose an opponent who has less resources than you. Then turn one of their dice to any side.
label: Persuade

name: Pickpocket
text: Discard a random card from each opponent's hand. Draw cards equal to the number of cards that were just discarded.
label: Pickpocket

name: Threaten
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's character die unless they deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Threaten

name: Trickery
text: Discard your hand. For each card just discarded, you may remove a die showing a value that is equal to that card's cost.
label: Trickery

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.
label: Truce

name: Stolen Cache
text: After you play this support, exhaust it. Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource. Discard this support from play.
label: Stolen Cache

name: Hidden Agenda
text: Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Hidden Agenda

name: Mandalorian Armor
text:
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield.
Attached character can have 1 additional shield.
flavor: Mandalorian armor was renowned for its durability.
label: Mandalorian Armor

name: Dangerous Mission
text: Turn a die to a side showing a resource cost.
label: Dangerous Mission

name: Endurance
text:
Play only if one or more of your dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round.
Roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Endurance

name: Partnership
text: Activate one of your characters and one of your supports. Then you may spend 1 resource to take an additional action.
label: Partnership

name: Recycle
text: Discard one of your supports from play. Then gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Recycle

name: Rend
text: Discard a support or upgrade that costs 0 from play.
flavor: When facing an overpowered adversary, precision often prevails over brute strength.
label: Rend

name: Roll On
text: Reroll one of your dice. You may reroll that die. You may reroll that die again.
flavor: "Come on, BB-8! Hurry!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: Roll On

name: Plastoid Armor
text: Attached character gains +1 health.
label: Plastoid Armor

name: B'Omarr Monastery
subtitle: Teth
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice showing a modifier side (a side with a +) as if it were not modified.
label: B'Omarr Monastery - Teth

name: Fort Anaxes
subtitle: Anaxes
text: While you control this battlefield, each of your characters have the Guardian keyword.
label: Fort Anaxes - Anaxes

name: Garel Spaceport
subtitle: Garel
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to gain resources equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.
label: Garel Spaceport - Garel

name: Imperial Academy
subtitle: Lothal
text: While you control this battlefield, after you activate a support, you may reroll its die.
label: Imperial Academy - Lothal

name: Main Plaza
subtitle: Vashka
text: Claim - Move 1 damage from a character to this battlefield or move all damage from this battlefield to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Main Plaza - Vashka

name: Medical Center
subtitle: Kaliida Shoals
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage each from up to 2 different characters. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.
label: Medical Center - Kaliida Shoals

name: Port District
subtitle: Bespin
text: While you control this battlefield, each card you play that costs 3 or more has the Ambush keyword.
label: Port District - Bespin

name: Weapons Factory Alpha
subtitle: Cymoon 1
text: While you control this battlefield, the cost of the first vehicle you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Weapons Factory Alpha - Cymoon 1
